text: The Black Ace (Spanish:El as negro) is a 1944 Mexican mystery film directed by René Cardona and starring David T. Bamberg and Manuel Medel.Cotter p.17 ==Cast== * David T. Bamberg as Fu Manchu * Tony Díaz * Janice Logan * Chel López * Manuel Medel * Salvador Quiroz * Charles Stevens == References == == Bibliography == * Cotter, Bob. The Mexican Masked Wrestler and Monster Filmography. McFarland & Company, 2005. == External links == * Category:1944 films Category:1944 mystery films Category:Mexican mystery films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by René Cardona Category:Mexican black-and-white films
title: The Black Ace (1944 film)
